Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to requiring seat belts on charter buses for persons age 8 through 16
Summary: Requires that seat belts be available and used on charter buses for persons age 8 through 16.
LawCode: Amd ยง1229-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to seat belts on charter buses
